description: This is a modern 'Global View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

panels.description: Global Network Utilization by Device, excluding common virtual devices to reduce noise (veth, azv, lxc, cali)
panels.title: Total Cluster Network Bandwidth (By Device)

panels.description: Total Network Received with all virtual devices by instance, including virtual devices and loopback
panels.title: Total Network Usage by Node

panels.description: Network Received without loopback by instance
panels.title: Network Usage by Node (Excluding Loopback/Virtual Devices)

panels.description: CPU Core Throttled by instance, no data means sufficient CPU or no throttling
panels.title: CPU Core Throttled Duration by Node

panels.description: CPU Throttled Seconds by Namespace, no data means no throttling, implying sufficient CPU or no limits applied
panels.title: CPU Throttled Duration by Namespace

title: Cluster Overview
